snippet: LeBron James scored 36 points, and the host Miami Heat moved back atop the Eastern Conference by running past the Indiana Pacers, 98-86, on Friday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat beat Indiana Pacers, 98-86; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 36 points, and the host Miami Heat moved back atop the Eastern Conference by running past the Indiana Pacers, 98-86, on Friday night.

headline.main: Heat Top Pacers to Reclaim Lead in East
headline.print_headline: Heat Top Pacers to Reclaim Lead in East
